item.title: Ohana, Hawaii
item.description: 时隔一年零两个月又八天，在生日的当天迎着湿润温暖的海风再次降落在夏威夷。这次选择的第一站是 Island of Hawaii，也就是因为面积最大而得名的大岛 （

item.title: Aloha, Hawaii
item.description: “No alien land in all the world has any deep strong charm for me but that one, no other land could so longingly and so beseechingly haunt me, sleeping and walking, through half a lifetime, as that one has done." – Mark Twain 夏威夷的七天，仿佛逃离尘世的七天，所有的工作、寒冷
